name: Capsuleaccom Hostel
description:
üå¥ Capsuleaccom ‚Äì Gold Coast‚Äôs Sleekest Sleep Pods in Southport ‚òÄÔ∏èüöÄ

Welcome to Capsuleaccom Southport, where minimalist style meets maximum comfort ‚Äì right in the heart of the Gold Coast. Whether you're a beach bum, city explorer or digital nomad chasing the sun, our sleep pods are your private retreat in a social paradise.

üõå Your Pod, Your Space:

Comfy mattress, fresh linen, plush towel & blackout privacy curtain

Personal power points + USB charging station

Lockable storage for all your gear

Reading light for your late-night scrolls or paperback binges

Air-conditioned comfort

üåä Why Stay With Us?

Located in Southport ‚Äì just minutes from beaches, cafes, trams, and nightlife

Super-clean, secure & modern ‚Äì CCTV, keycard entry, and daily housekeeping

Chill-out zone to meet fellow travelers, swap stories, or plan your next surf

Fast Wi-Fi (for your travel blog or‚Ä¶Netflix)

Vending machines for those midnight munchies

üéØ Best For:
Solo adventurers, minimalist travelers, or anyone craving a quiet night‚Äôs sleep without missing the vibe. Think Japanese-style capsule living ‚Äì but with Aussie warmth and sunshine.

üåü Stay smart. Stay sleek. Stay social.
Your capsule is waiting at Capsule Accom Southport ‚Äì the future of budget travel on the Gold Coast.


1. A passport MUST be presented at check in
2. Bad behaviour is NOT tolerated. (We reserve the right to cancel a booking at any-time). 
3. A ZERO tolerance to illicit drugs. 
4. This is a SMOKE AND VAPE FREE venue. We do however have a smoking corner.
5. A charge of $20 per item will be charged if goods are damaged or not returned. 
6. People with facial or neck tattoos will be refused accommodation. 
7. We provide individual SAFES/LOCKERS. Electrical devices left unattended in capsules will be confiscated. (Fire prevention is imperative). 
8. BREAKFAST (Ham and Cheese Sandwich + Coffee for $5.00) 
9. Alcohol can be purchased off site and BYO is accepted.
10. Guests are expected to respect property rules and fellow guests. Any damage caused may result in charges and guests may be asked to leave
11. All prices are inclusive of all taxes and government charges.
12.  Age restrictions: 18-40 years. Please inquire before booking.
13. Pets are not allowed within the hostel premises.
14. Liability: The hostel is not liable for any injuries, accidents, or illnesses that occur during the stay.
15. NO SCHOOLIES

houseRules.notes:
Check-in/Check-out Policies
This property has the following check-in and check-out times and policies:

Check-In: 2:00 PM
Check-Out: 10:00 AM

Late check-in (after 9:00 PM and before 6:00 PM), please inform us in advance to receive the late check-in instructions.

Property and Cancelation Policies :
Free cancellation 3 days before the arrival

Terms and Conditions
